jeps.title: Lambda Expressions
jeps.description: Add lambda expressions, default methods, and related features to the Java programming language and modify the VM and libraries to support them.

jeps.title: Autoconf-Based Build System
jeps.description: Provide a new build system for the JDK, based on the GNU Autoconf framework.

jeps.title: Enhance javac to Improve Build Speed
jeps.description: Improve the build speed of large projects by enhancing javac to store symbol information in a separate cache.

jeps.title: Reduce Cache Contention on Specified Fields
jeps.description: Reduce cache contention for fields that are frequently accessed in parallel by different threads.

jeps.title: Launch JavaFX Applications
jeps.description: Define a standard and convenient way to launch JavaFX applications.

jeps.title: The Modular JDK
jeps.description: Modularize the JDK and make it scale down for small devices, improve security and maintainability, and improve performance.

jeps.title: Milling Project Coin
jeps.description: A follow-up to Project Coin that includes small language changes to improve the developer experience.

jeps.title: jshell: The Java Shell
jeps.description: Create an interactive tool for evaluating declarations, statements, and expressions of the Java programming language.

jeps.title: More Concurrency Updates
jeps.description: Improve the CompletableFuture API and add interoperation with other concurrency components.

jeps.title: Convenience Factory Methods for Collections
jeps.description: Define library APIs to make it convenient to create instances of collections and maps with small numbers of elements.

jeps.title: Local-Variable Type Inference
jeps.description: Enhance the Java Language to extend type inference to declarations of local variables with initializers.

jeps.title: Consolidate the JDK Forest into a Single Repository
jeps.description: Combine the numerous repositories of the JDK forest into a single repository.

jeps.title: Garbage-Collector Interface
jeps.description: Improve the source code isolation of different garbage collectors by introducing a clean garbage collector interface.

jeps.title: Parallel Full GC for G1
jeps.description: Improve G1 worst-case latencies by making the full GC parallel.

jeps.title: Application Class-Data Sharing
jeps.description: Extend the existing Class-Data Sharing (CDS) feature to allow application classes to be placed in the shared archive.
